name: Escape from LaVille 1
description:
Escape from LaVille will amaze you with challenging riddles and puzzles!

You are the detective Forest Campbell,
a member of the W.E.S.T. (Weird Enigma Special Team) which is seeking for the truth about LaVille district.
Solving the puzzles you will discover the dark and intriguing history of this cursed district.
Collecting the articles of the local newspaper you will get an important perspective for your investigation: the LaVille inhabitants point of view.


2011, something strange happened to LaVille district.
A mysterious virus hit the inhabitants who got sick and started to die, one by one.
The weirdest thing is that after death their bodies are… back to life!
Forest Campbell is engaged to solve the mystery behind the district but when he arrives he
find himself surrounded by death.
The investigation leads him into an old mansion that seems to be the key to the mystery…


Features:
◆ Lots of puzzles to solve!
◆ Awesome locations to explore!
◆ Dozens of items to solve the riddles!
◆ Beautiful dark soundtrack to delight your gaming!
◆ Outstanding graphics to taste!
◆ Several newspaper articles to collect and read!
◆ Immersive storyline to keep yourself into the game!
